metadata.title: PICES Scientific Report No. 18 (2001) - Proceedings of the PICES/CoML/IPRC Workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific" / edited by Vera Alexander ... [et al.]
metadata.description:
Define existing observation and prediction system (regional and basin-scales), identify needed improvements to the existing system for increasing the understanding of biodiversity and climate-linked changes in biodiversity, and nominate existing time series and predictions for inclusion into a PICES Ecosystem Status Report.  

International workshop on "Impact of Climate Variability on Observation and Prediction of Ecosystem and Biodiversity Changes in the North Pacific" co-sponsored by the Census of Marine Life (CoML) and the International Pacific Research Center (IPRC), held from March 7-9, 2001, at the East-West Center, Honolulu, Hawaii.   

LC Call No. GC781 .P535 no.18.  ISBN 0968510086
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To review the goals and strategies for observing North Pacific marine ecosystem and their biodiversity and to improve our ability to predict ecosystem change.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Acknowledgement of source publication required.
